可雇用者；符合最低雇用要求者

word_group.brief_definition: 员工绩效；雇员业绩；员工表现
联邦雇员；联邦政府雇员；政府雇员
优秀员工；优秀的员工；出色的员工
临时雇员；临时员工；临时工
游乐园员工；公园工作人员；公园工作者
另一名工薪阶层；另一位国家雇员

bilingual.source: The company has hired a new employee.

bilingual.target: 每个雇员都需要参加培训。

bilingual.source: As an employee, he works very hard.
bilingual.target: 作为一名雇员，他工作非常努力。

bilingual.source: The employee at this restaurant is very friendly.
bilingual.target: 这家餐厅的雇员非常友好。

bilingual.source: They are looking for new employee to fill the vacancy.
bilingual.target: 他们正在寻找新的雇员来填补空缺。

bilingual.source: The manager's decision to fire the employee was unjustifiable.
bilingual.target: 经理解雇员工的决定是不可辩解的。

bilingual.source: She's a former council employee/employee of the council.
He was murdered by a former employee.
bilingual.target: 他被一名前雇员谋杀了。

list.abstract: employee（[ɪmˈplɔɪiː]），英语单词。词性是名词，释义为雇员；雇工。例句：One luxury brand employee quit her job.（一名奢侈品牌员工辞去了工作）。 近义词为hireling。反义词为employer。

yingyinNormal.en: Impersonating a federal employee? Where's the after-party, prison?
yingyinNormal.zh: 冒充联邦雇员吗？你们的庆功宴在哪举办，监狱吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The money that we traced was to an employee. You're an employee of Silk Road.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们追踪的钱款是打给网站雇员的，你是丝路的雇员。

yingyinNormal.en: Is that because you are an independent contractor engaged by Lockhart/Gardner, and technically not an employee of the firm? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是因为你是和洛&加律所签约的独立合同人，严格说来并非律所雇员，对吗？对。

yingyinNormal.en: If you're a small business owner or employee of a large business that depends on financing to tackle new markets and create new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你是中小企业主或大企业的雇员，只要你们在开拓海外市场扩大业务方面需要资金支持，你们就应该支持进出口银行，

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Welcome. Wait, I'm sorry, not welcome. Not an employee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，欢迎，等等，对不起，不欢迎，你不在这工作了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, let's ask my wall of 374 consecutive employee-of-the-month awards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们问问我的连续374届获得月度最佳员工的记录墙吧！

yingyinNormal.en: You see, Barney here was content to work for the small-end money, as an employee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巴尼为了一丁点儿小钱，就愿意给人家打工卖命。

yingyinNormal.en: What's this? Read it. Sheldon Cooper, Caltech University employee information? At the bottom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么？读读看。谢尔顿·库珀，加利福尼亚理工大学员工资料。读读下面。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, thank you for noticing. I'm "Menial Employee of the Month." Do you have a particular field in mind?
yingyinNormal.zh: 多谢提醒。我可是“月度低贱员工之星”呢。你有啥意向不？

yingyinNormal.en: But as you are aware, sir, the employee handbook clearly states, and I quote, "No employee may, in part or in whole, commit the Krabby Patty secret formula to any recorded written or visual form, including memories, dreams, and or needlepoint."
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是，老板，如你所知，员工手册上清楚写着“任何人不得以记忆、做梦、或是刺绣等方式将部分或全部蟹黄堡秘方转换为任何书面记录或是视觉形式。”
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Alex is your employee. If she's doing something that's making Leonard uncomfortable, you should talk to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾利克斯是你的员工，如果她做出一些让莱纳德觉得不舒服的事，那你应该跟她谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: It turns out that you are the lowest paid employee in that company. Everybody makes between 70 and a hundred thousand dollars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你却是整个公司年薪最低的，每个人年薪都在七万到十万美金之间。

yingyinNormal.en: If an employee contributed to the growth and profitability of the company, they got to share in the profits and the benefits as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果员工为企业发展贡献了力量，为企业创造了利润，那么他们就应该分享企业的利润，得到相应的福利待遇。

yingyinNormal.en: Compared to situation where you offered 65,000, but you are the highest paid employee in the company, everybody is making between 45 and 65.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果给你年薪六万五美金，你是公司薪水最高的，大家都在四万五到六万五之间。

yingyinNormal.en: Not your legal stratagems, our legal stratagems from when we worked for you. Yes, when you were a Lockhart/Gardner employee, in other words, our work product.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法律策略不是你们的，这是我们给你们打工时提出来的。没错，当时你们受雇于加律所，换句话说，那就是我们的工作成果。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to cut my losses so that my company, Bridgewater, was left with one employee, me. I was so broke, I had to borrow $4000, from my dad to pay my bills. But even worse was having to let go the people I cared so much about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了减少损失，我的公司Bridgewater，只剩下了一个员工就是我自己。我彻底破产，被迫向我父亲借了4000美金支付我的账单。更痛苦的是放弃那些我曾经非常在乎的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 失业的；闲置的；未用的
n. 就业；受雇；应用；使用；工作；职业；雇用
adj. 适宜雇用的；有资格任职的；称职的

word_family.mean: v. 雇用；用；利用；使用；使从事；使忙碌

sense_info_list.en: a person who is paid to work for an organization or for another person

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, it has more than $120 billion in unfunded liabilities, mostly for <highlight>employee</highlight> health and retirement costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同时，它（美国邮政署）有超过1200亿美元的无准备金负债，主要用于雇员的健康和退休费用。

examination_example.sentence: This new focus on personal fulfillment can help keep <highlight>employees</highlight> motivated amid increasingly loud debates over work-life balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在对工作与生活平衡的争论日益激烈的背景下，这种对个人成就感的新关注可以帮助保持员工的积极性。

examination_example.sentence: The bargain is very pure: <highlight>Employee</highlight> puts in hours of physical or mental labor and <highlight>employee</highlight> draws out life-sustaining moola.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种交易非常纯粹：雇员付出数小时的体力或脑力劳动，而雇员则提取维持生命的钱财。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 雇用；用；利用；使用；使从事；使忙碌

sense_info_list.en: a person employed for wages or salary, especially at non-executive level

examination_example.sentence: It causes conflicts between employers and <highlight>employees</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 引起雇主和雇员之间的冲突。

examination_example.sentence: It may do harm to his fellow <highlight>employees</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能会对他的同事造成伤害。

examination_example.sentence: It was based only on the perspective of <highlight>employees</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它只是基于员工的观点。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 侧重指在利害关系上密切相关。
<highlight>客户</highlight>
<highlight>同事</highlight>
<highlight>同事</highlight>
指陪伴他人的人, 即同伴或陪伴。
指具有共同的事业、利益关系相一致的人。
<highlight>雇员</highlight>
多用复数形式, 指一块住、生活或同行共事的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: When IT is operating as it should, <highlight>employee</highlight> self-confidence swells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当信息技术正常运行时，员工的自信心会倍增。

examination_example.sentence: Banning discrimination on the basis of <highlight>employees</highlight>' body image.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止基于员工身体形象的歧视。

examination_example.sentence: "Due to this arctic outbreak and Concerns for the safety of USPS <highlight>employees</highlight>," USPS announced Wednesday miming, "the Postal Service is suspending delivery Jan. 30 in some 3-digit ZIP Code locations."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政服务公司周三上午宣布：“由于此次在北极发生的突发事件和对美国邮政服务公司员工安全的担忧，邮政服务公司将于1月30日暂停在一些3位数邮政编码地区的邮递服务。”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 就业；受雇；应用；使用；工作；职业；雇用
adj. 失业的；闲置的；未用的

word_family.mean: v. 雇用；用；利用；使用；使从事；使忙碌

sense_info_list.en: a person employed for wages or salary, especially at nonexecutive level

examination_example.sentence: Yet the demand is there, with UneeQ seeing high adoption of its digital <highlight>employees</highlight> across the financial, health care, and commercial sectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，需求是存在的，UneeQ发现其数字员工在金融、医疗保健和商业部门的使用率都很高。

examination_example.sentence: Minutes after the last movie ended yesterday at the Plaza Theater, <highlight>employees</highlight> were busy sweeping up popcorns and gathering coke cups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 昨天，在广场剧院的最后一场电影结束后几分钟，员工们忙着扫除爆米花，收集可乐杯。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，侧重指在利害关系上密切相关。
<highlight>客户</highlight>
<highlight>同事</highlight>
<highlight>同事</highlight>
指陪伴他人的人，即同伴或陪伴。
指具有共同的事业、利益关系相一致的人。
<highlight>雇员</highlight>
多用复数形式，指一块住、生活或同行共事的人。
